meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>revolve</kanji> to <kanji>review</kanji> the <kanji>record</kanji> of the past. These records are <vocabulary>memoirs</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>reminiscences</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
